code: import Platform from"react-native-web/dist/exports/Platform";export default function getDefaultHeaderHeight(layout,modalPresentation,statusBarHeight){var headerHeight;var isLandscape=layout.width>layout.height;if(Platform.OS==='ios'){if(Platform.isPad||Platform.isTVOS){if(modalPresentation){headerHeight=56;}else{headerHeight=50;}}else{if(isLandscape){headerHeight=32;}else{if(modalPresentation){headerHeight=56;}else{headerHeight=44;}}}}else if(Platform.OS==='android'){headerHeight=56;}else{headerHeight=64;}return headerHeight+statusBarHeight;}
